random(arr: Array) → {any}

return a random array element


 // Select a random array element
 var arr = [ "foo", "bar", "baz" ];
 console.log(me.utils.array.random(arr));

Type Description
Array

the modified Array var arr = [ "foo", "bar", "baz" ]; // remove "foo" from the array me.utils.array.remove(arr, "foo");
